name: Loving Legends- Demo
description:
Do you like mythological creatures? Are you a fan of dating sims? Ever wanted to date a cryptid? 

If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you'll love "Loving Legends", my text-based cryptid dating simulator. While it's currently only a demo, I have 6 possible routes planned, and a whole bunch of interesting plots! The game is entirely gender neutral, and the first and last name of the player are changeable. 

Good luck, enjoy, and thank you for supporting me in this journey. Expect the full game in early 2022!

Game created in Twine. Consider making your own at twinery.org !
